title: This Book Was Not Meant For Us | Build Up, Don’t Tear Down
description:
There are very few books like it. Certainly, none written by someone in such an unusual position.

You see, Meditations was not meant to be a book for the reader, it was a book for the author. In Greek, it was titled Eis heauton or “To Himself.” A more recent title also captures the essence: The Emperor’s Handbook.

📕 We created a premium leather-bound edition of Meditations - To learn more and to pick up your own copy of this beautiful new edition of Meditations, visit dailystoic.com/meditations

📱 Follow us: Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, TikTok, and Facebook 

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
